page.title: 15Cameley Primary School i
page.content: Cameley Primary School is a Voluntary Controlled Church of England School in the village of Temple Cloud.The main building dates from the 1860's and houses the hall,staffroom/office and kitchen(meals are not cooked on site). In addition to a tarmac playground there is an outdoor swimming pool to which is attached the toilet block. Three huts house the classrooms and library.The school has the use of the village recreation ground approx. 1/2 mile away.In Sept'85 there were 60 on roll:16 Infants in Class 1;22 Infants and Lwr.juniors in Class 2;22 Top Juniors in Class 3.In addition to the Head there are 2 full-time teachers+1/10 part-timer,2 cleaners,4 kitchen and dining room staff,1 ancillary,1 secretary and 1 road crossing patrol.
